user.title: Dutch Fuel Prices Setup
user.description: Configure fuel price monitoring for your location

data_description.use_town_selector: Enable to select from Dutch towns, disable for manual coordinates
data_description.town: Select by postcode or town name (e.g., 1621 or Hoorn)
data_description.update_interval: Continuous updates every X minutes (uses API quota)
data_description.scheduled_updates: Update only at specific times (more efficient)
data_description.notify_services: Type your notification service name (e.g., mobile_app_your_phone_name) or select from list. Find yours in Developer Tools → Services → notify.

abort.already_configured: This fuel type for this location is already configured
